original_title: Alcaraz beats Djokovic for first Wimbledon title
original_body_lines: 20-year-old Spaniard Carlos Alcaraz beat Serbia's Novak Djokovic to win his first Wimbledon title.
World number 1 ranked Alcaraz dropped the first set 6-1, but fought back to win the next two sets 7-6 (8-6), 6-1 in Sunday's Men's singles final.
Defending champion Djokovic then won the third set 6-3, but Alcaraz fought back to win the decider 6-4.
